Subject: Beta Login Test Released
Message-ID: <9bj9a9+pcis@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 1271
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: Yanshosh@...

After days of slaving over chunks of code, learning chunks of new
stuff, and fixing countless bugs, I have managed to get a working
version of the soon-to-be multi-featured NBW Site Login Script to
work. Now I need a few (the more the better) to help me test it.

The script can be found at:

http://nbwrpg.com/nbwrpg/cgi-bin/Login/login.cgi

What I want you guys to do is log in as the test account (username:
"test", password: "test". CASE SENSITIVE, no quote marks), and put the
server through as much hell as possible. Make profiles with funky
characters, HTML code, names with spaces, names with funky characters,
anything imaginable to try to completely confuse the system. If it
crashes on you, please email me and tell me exactly what you did prior
to it crashing, and I'll fix the bug. Right now all that is available
is the character editor/maker/viewer/killer, but as soon as it is
totaly debugged, more stuff will be made available, like polls, chat,
and stuff like that.

I hope as many people as possible participate in this. Besides, its
fun crashing my comp, and here's your chance to! :-)

I'll be expecting a flood of bug reports tomorrow. Get to work,
testers! I'm also totaly wasted from all the programming, so I'm going
to bed. Goodnight, everyone.
